game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the hidden temple and retrieve the ancient artifact.
game.description: The temple is said to be hidden deep within the forest, guarded by treacherous paths and fierce creatures. Retrieve the artifact and bring it back to the village elder.

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location.
task.description: Speak with the village elder and gather rumors about the temple's whereabouts.

task.objective: Navigate through the forest to reach the temple.
task.description: Use your knowledge of the forest and its dangers to navigate safely to the temple.

task.objective: Retriev the ancient artifact from within the temple.
task.description: Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to reach the artifact, then carefully retrieve it and escape the temple.
